title: DFG
body:
I know many champs may be worse off without DFG, even though they are getting compensating buffs.

But, we truly forget those who will miss it the most...

Tristana, Rengar, Shaco, Nunu, Sejuani, Malphite... WHAT ABOUT THEM RIOT! 

Not gonna lie though, I'm gonna miss having fun with ap Rengar and such...

R.I.P IN PEACE DFG

ty dfg

{{champion:39}}

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=nismo09,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=nQdyZlwr,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-01-25T00:29:51.904+0000)
>
> Ap tristana rip

The have butchered her AP ratios on PBE and introduced AD ratios too. They just don't like AP Tristana, it seems.
{{champion:86}} was hit the hardest {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} (some people played dfg garen alot)
LeBlanc and Diana are hit hard by this, Diana's ratios are so bad she needs DFG to kill people, rofl.
Dog core item for my Diana build. No more assassin for her :( back too bruiser diana

I am gonna miss it. I mean, it made Lulu deal more damage with autos. 

That was the purpose right?
